example.eg: Do you see the ducks in the pond?
example.egtrans: 你看到池塘里的鸭子了吗？

example.eg: We ate Peking duck at the Chinese restaurant.
example.egtrans: 我们在一家中国餐馆吃了北京烤鸭。

example.eg: Larry made a quick duck to avoid hitting his head on the door frame.
example.egtrans: 拉里突然低头来避免头撞到门框上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 忽然低头躲避, 忽然弓身躲避

example.eg: He ducked when the ball came flying at him.
example.egtrans: 球飞向他的时候，他低头躲开了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 忽地低下头, 忽地弯腰

example.eg: He ducked to the side when the ball came flying at him.
example.egtrans: 球飞过来，他躲闪到一边。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 躲避, 闪避, 躲闪

example.eg: The players had to duck a shower of various missiles as they left the pitch.
example.egtrans: 运动员在离场的时候，不得不躲闪大量的抛掷物。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 躲闪, 躲避, 躲开

example.eg: To avoid saying hello, he ducked under a desk.
example.egtrans: 不想打招呼的他躲进了桌子下面。

example.eg: Ryan ducked under the water and resurfaced a few seconds later.
example.egtrans: 瑞恩一头扎入水中，几秒后又露出了水面。

example.eg: He was out for a duck.
Cup of tea, duck?
The hammock is made of duck.
She ducked her appointment and went to the cinema instead.
I deliberately sat at the back of the room near the door so I could duck out if the meeting was boring.
She managed to duck out of the lecture without anyone seeing her.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偷偷离开, 悄悄溜走

example.eg: He would often try to duck out of his boss's motivational meetings.
The movie is set in the 1950s, and all of the actors have DAs.

dsense.name: a dead duck
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative ([sth] that will not succeed)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很可能会失败的事, 注定失败的人或事, 鸭绒

example.eg: He always tries to duck out of talking to my parents.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 避开, 躲避, 逃避

example.eg: I ducked my head to avoid hitting it on the lintel.

dsense.name: duck-billed
dsense.guideword: (animal: with a bill like a duck's) (动物)

example.eg: Paleontologists have found the skeleton of a duck-billed dinosaur.
When the duck-billed platypus was first described in Europe, everyone thought it was a hoax.
example.egtrans: 欧洲人第一次听说鸭嘴兽时，都以为是什么人的恶作剧。

dsense.name: ducks and drakes, duck and drake

example.eg: Duct tape can be used to repair almost anything.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强力胶带, 密封胶带

example.eg: That guy is such a lame duck; he's never going to make anything of his life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无能的人（或物），不中用的人（或物），废物

dsense.name: lame duck
dsense.guideword: US, figurative (politician before handing over power)

example.eg: George W Bush was a lame duck from Election Day 2008 to January 20th, 2009.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 即将届满卸任的从政者

example.eg: The platypus is an endangered animal.
Children often play with rubber ducks at bathtime.
With nothing to protect himself from the enemy, he was a sitting duck.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 易被击中的目标，易被欺骗的对象

example.eg: What a strange duck he is.
